node.html:
• This web mapping platform digitizes the entire railway infrastructure of Kazakhstan.
  • Frontend was build via Angular framework with help of Leaflet library
  • Backend was build via Spring Boot framework with help of GraphHopper library

• Developed and styled interactive web applications using React and Gatsby library
  • Built and shipped leveraging third-party and internal API integrations
  • Architected and implemented the user interface

• A web application that helps students in grades 9 and 11 in Astana navigate their careers by evaluating their strengths and knowledge using a career guidance test.
  • Web app used by 15 000 high school students in one month

• Worked with bugs and testing
  • Developed microservices
  • Developed an SMS Service that is used by 68000 people on a regular basis.
